I would rely on technology to gain knowledge. I could use search engines, online databases, and educational websites to access information on various topics.
I would seek out alternative sources of knowledge, such as videos, podcasts, and interviews with experts in various fields.
I would explore the world around me and observe the natural world, using my senses and intuition to gain knowledge about the world.
I would seek out mentors and experts in various fields to learn from their experiences and insights.
I would use my imagination and creativity to generate new knowledge and ideas, drawing on my own experiences and insights to create new insights and discoveries.
